Detailed Description

Tracker Utility class to get the ladder sensor readout channel from a point in the Global frame.

int TkSens::GetLayer (   )  [private]
 

checks if the point is on a layer

Parameters:
z Z coordinate of global position (cm)
For the Z-coordinate, +/- 1 cm of the layer position is accepted For the X,Y-coordinates, inactive area is also accepted
